translations.eac3.bitstream.ad_conv_type._description: Indicates whether the audio has passed through HDCD A/D conversion.
translations.dca.standard.bitrate._description: The bitrate used for encoding audio. Higher bitrate implies better quality.
translations.libfdk_aac.standard.strategy.b._descript: The bitrate used for encoding audio. Higher bitrate implies better quality.
translations.libfdk_aac.standard.strategy.vbr._descri:
Set VBR mode, from 1 to 5. 1 is lowest quality (though still pretty good) and 5 is highest quality. A value of 0 will disable VBR, and CBR (Constant Bit Rate) is enabled.

Currently only the 'aac_low' profile supports VBR encoding.
translations.libfdk_aac.misc.header_period._descripti: Set StreamMuxConfig and PCE repetition period (in frames) for sending in-band configuration buffers within LATM/LOAS transport layer.
translations.libfdk_aac.misc.signaling._description:
Set SBR/PS signaling style.

It can assume one of the following values:

'default'
choose signaling implicitly (explicit hierarchical by default, implicit if global header is disabled)

'implicit'
implicit backwards compatible signaling

'explicit_sbr'
explicit SBR, implicit PS signaling

'explicit_hierarchical'
explicit hierarchical signaling
translations.flac.compression.compression_level._desc: Higher values result in smaller files, but slightly longer encoding time.
translations.libopus.standard.strategy.vbr_on._descri: In VBR mode the bitrate may go up and down freely depending on the content to achieve more consistent quality.
translations.libopus.standard.strategy.vbr_off._descr: With hard-cbr every frame will be exactly the same size, similar to how speech codecs work. This delivers lower overall quality but is useful where bitrate changes might leak data in encrypted channels or on synchronous transports.
translations.libopus.standard.strategy.vbr_constraine: Outputs to a specific bitrate. This mode is analogous to CBR in AAC/MP3 encoders and managed mode in Vorbis coders. This delivers less consistent quality than VBR mode but consistent bitrate.
translations.libvorbis.standard.strategy._description: Используемый режим кодирования. Выберите Усреднённый битрейт (ABR), Постоянное качество (CRF), Постоянное квантование (CQP) или Без потерь (Lossless).
translations.libvorbis.standard.strategy.abr._descrip: Усреднённая скорость передачи данных, разрешенная кодеку.
translations.libvorbis.standard.strategy.cqp._descrip: Set constant quality setting for VBR. The value should be a float number in the range of -1 to 10. The higher the value, the better the quality.
translations.h264_qsv.standard.maxrate._description: Высокие значения могут повысить максимальное качество, но увеличивают требования к декодеру.
translations.h264_qsv.advanced.max_frame_size._descri: Maximum encoded frame size in bytes
translations.h264_qsv.advanced.max_slice_size._descri: Maximum encoded slice size in bytes
translations.h264_qsv.advanced.low_power._description: enable low power mode(experimental: many limitations by mfx version, BRC modes, etc.)
translations.h264_qsv.advanced.pic_timing_sei._descri: Insert picture timing SEI with pic_struct_syntax element
translations.h264_qsv.advanced.single_sei_nal_unit._d: Put all the SEI messages into one NALU
translations.h264_qsv.advanced.max_dec_frame_bufferin: Maximum number of frames buffered in the DPB
translations.h264_qsv.advanced.look_ahead_depth._desc: Depth of look ahead in number frames
translations.h264_qsv.advanced.look_ahead_downsamplin: Downscaling factor for the frames saved for the lookahead analysis
translations.h264_qsv.advanced.int_ref_cycle_size._de: Number of frames in the intra refresh cycle
translations.h264_qsv.advanced.int_ref_qp_delta._desc: QP difference for the refresh MBs
translations.h264_qsv.advanced.aud._description: Insert the Access Unit Delimiter NAL
translations.hevc_qsv.standard.maxrate._description: Высокие значения могут повысить максимальное качество, но увеличивают требования к декодеру.
translations.hevc_qsv.advanced.max_frame_size._descri: Maximum encoded frame size in bytes
translations.hevc_qsv.advanced.max_slice_size._descri: Maximum encoded slice size in bytes
translations.hevc_qsv.advanced.low_power._description: enable low power mode(experimental: many limitations by mfx version, BRC modes, etc.)
translations.hevc_qsv.advanced.gpb._description: 1: GPB (generalized P/B frame); 0: regular P frame (default 1)
translations.mpeg2_qsv.standard.maxrate._description: Высокие значения могут повысить максимальное качество, но увеличивают требования к декодеру.
translations.mpeg2_qsv.advanced.max_frame_size._descr: Maximum encoded frame size in bytes
translations.mpeg2_qsv.advanced.max_slice_size._descr: Maximum encoded slice size in bytes
translations.mpeg2_qsv.advanced.low_power._descriptio: enable low power mode(experimental: many limitations by mfx version, BRC modes, etc.)
translations.mpeg2video.standard.strategy._descriptio: Используемый режим кодирования. Выберите Битрейт или Качество.
translations.mpeg2video.standard.maxrate._description: Высокие значения могут повысить максимальное качество, но увеличивают требования к декодеру.
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.gop_timecode._descri: MPEG GOP Timecode in hh:mm:ss[:;.]ff format. Overrides timecode_frame_start.
Timecode is in drop frame format.
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.scan_offset._descrip: Reserve space for SVCD scan offset user data.
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.timecode_frame_start: GOP timecode frame start number, in non-drop-frame format
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.video_format._descri: Video_format in the sequence_display_extension indicating the source of the video.
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.mpv_flags._descripti: Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders.
single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.chroma_elim_threshol: single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient)
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.error_rate._descript: Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment.
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.qsquish._description: how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function)
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.rc_eq._description: Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.border_mask._descrip: increase the quantizer for macroblocks close to borders
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.force_duplicated_mat: Always write luma and chroma matrix for mjpeg, useful for rtp streaming.
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.brd_scale._descripti: Downscale frames for dynamic B-frame decision
translations.mpeg2video.advanced.mpeg_quant._descript: Use MPEG quantizers instead of H.263
translations.libsvt_av1.standard.maxrate._description: Высокие значения могут повысить максимальное качество, но увеличивают требования к декодеру.
translations.libsvt_av1.advanced.bl_mode._description: Random Access Prediction Structure type setting
translations.libsvt_av1.advanced.forced-idr._descript: При принудительно расстановке ключевых кадров использовать их как IDR (разделители).
translations.libsvt_hevc.standard.preset._description: Encoding preset (Lower values result in higher quality and encoding time.
translations.libsvt_hevc.advanced.bl_mode._descriptio: Random Access Prediction Structure type setting
translations.libsvt_hevc.advanced.forced-idr._descrip: При принудительно расстановке ключевых кадров использовать их как IDR (разделители).
translations.libsvt_hevc.advanced.asm_type._descripti: Assembly instruction set type [false: C Only, true: Auto]
translations.filter.bwdif.standard.parity._descriptio: Specify the assumed picture field parity
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.luma_msize_x._de: Set the luma matrix horizontal size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.luma_msize_y._de: Set the luma matrix vertical size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.luma_amount._des: Set the luma effect strength. It must be a floating point number, reasonable values lay between -1.5 and 1.5. Negative values will blur the input video, while positive values will sharpen it, a value of zero will disable the effect.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.chroma_msize_x._: Set the chroma matrix horizontal size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.chroma_msize_y._: Set the chroma matrix vertical size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.chroma_amount._d: Set the chroma effect strength. It must be a floating point number, reasonable values lay between -1.5 and 1.5. Negative values will blur the input video, while positive values will sharpen it, a value of zero will disable the effect.
translations.filter.yadif.standard.parity._descriptio: Specify the assumed picture field parity.
